titleStmt.title: Mr. Thomas Wadsworth's Last warning to secure sinners being his two last sermons concerning the certainty and dreadfulness of the future misery of all impenitent ungodly sinners : to which is prefixed an epistle of Mr. Richard Baxter's.
titleStmt.author: Wadsworth, Thomas, 1630-1676.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
